name: Firework game
description:
It's the new year, and you should be celebrating, but the cheapest flight you could find was an overnight flight Dec 31-Jan 1, so you're stuck on a plane and can't participate in the celebration. BUT WAIT! Is that a firework, headed right towards the plane?

Survive as long as possible without hitting anything. Click the area above to begin (or tab to it and press Enter), and use the arrow keys to move (or WASD), P or escape to pause.

Made for Eevee's Games Made Quick game jam, with the theme "something ironic, like hard to speedrun".

Also playable on my website; Source; last updated 2017-01-16
